comprehensive_overview: BoTorch is a library for Bayesian optimization built on PyTorch. It provides a modular and scalable approach to Bayesian optimization, including state-of-the-art methods for acquisition functions, models, and optimizers, all implemented in PyTorch.
core_features: Modular and scalable approach to Bayesian optimization
State-of-the-art methods for acquisition functions, models, and optimizers
Implemented in PyTorch for seamless integration with deep learning workflows
